_managed.description: Choose level of restriction for managed config
_managed.title: Managed Storage Level

_openOptionsOnInstall.description: Control whether the Option's page should be opened on installation
_openOptionsOnInstall.title: Open Options On Install

censorCharacter.description: Set the character to mask letters with. (Default: *) [Censor]
censorCharacter.title: Censor Character

censorFixedLength.description: Set a fixed length for words masked by the filter. [Censor]
censorFixedLength.title: Censor Fixed Length

defaultSubstitution.description: Used as the substitution for words that don't have a substitution. [Substitute]
defaultSubstitution.title: Default Substitution

defaultWordMatchMethod.description: Default match method for new words.
defaultWordMatchMethod.title: Default Word Match Method

defaultWordRepeat.description: Default selection for matching repeated characters on new words.
defaultWordRepeat.title: Default Word Repeat

defaultWordSeparators.description: Default selection for matching separators on new words.
defaultWordSeparators.title: Default Word Separators

domains.description: Object with customized settings for domains.
domains.title: Domains

adv.description: When set to true the domain will use Advanced mode.
adv.title: Domain Advanced Mode

deep.description: When set to true the domain will use Deep mode.
deep.title: Domain Deep Mode

disabled.description: When set to true the filter will be disabled on the domain. [Domain Mode: Normal]
disabled.title: Domain Disabled

enabled.description: When set to true the filter will be enabled on the domain. [Domain Mode: Minimal]
enabled.title: Domain Enabled

framesOff.description: When set to true the filter will not filter frames on the domain. [Domain Frame Mode: All]
framesOff.title: Domain Frames Off

framesOn.description: When set to true the filter will filter frames on the domain. [Domain Frame Mode: None]
framesOn.title: Domain Frames On

wordlist.description: Set the desired wordlist for the domain.
wordlist.title: Domain Word List

enabledDomainsOnly.description: When set to true the filter will only run on provided domains.
enabledDomainsOnly.title: Enabled Domains Only

enabledFramesOnly.description: When set to true the filter will only filter frames on provided domains.
enabledFramesOnly.title: Enabled Frames Only

filterMethod.description: Determines which filter method (Censor, Substitute, etc.) will be used.
filterMethod.title: Filter Method

filterWordList.description: When set to true the Word list in the Option's page will be filtered.
filterWordList.title: Filter Word List

iWordAllowlist.description: Words included here won't be filtered (case-insensitive).
iWordAllowlist.title: Case-Insensitive Word Allowlist

items.description: Case-insensitive word that won't be filtered.
items.title: Case-Insensitive Word Allowlist Word

password.description: Require password to access the Options page or to make changes.
password.title: Password

preserveFirst.description: Preserve first character of filtered word. [Censor]
preserveFirst.title: Preserve First

preserveLast.description: Preserve last character of filtered word. [Censor]
preserveLast.title: Preserve Last

showCounter.description: When set to true a badge by the extension icon will show the number of filtered words for the current page.
showCounter.title: Show Counter

showSummary.description: When set to true the extension popup window will show a summary of the filtered words for the current page.
showSummary.title: Show Summary

showUpdateNotification.description: When set to true the extension will show a notification when an update is installed.
showUpdateNotification.title: Show Update Notification

substitutionMark.description: When set to true the extension will add a mark ([]) around filtered words. [Substitute]
substitutionMark.title: Substitution Mark

syncLargeKeys.description: When set to true the extension will attempt to sync large parts of the config, such as words.
syncLargeKeys.title: Sync Large Keys

wordAllowlist.description: Words included here won't be filtered (case-sensitive).
wordAllowlist.title: Case-sensitive Word Allowlist

items.description: Case-sensitive word that won't be filtered.
items.title: Case-Sensitive Word Allowlist Word

wordSubSeparator.description: Change the word separator for multiple substitutions. (Default: ';;') [Substitute]
wordSubSeparator.title: Word Sub Separator

wordlistsEnabled.description: When set to true the extension will allow use of wordlists. (Default: true)
wordlistsEnabled.title: Wordlists Enabled

lists.description: Wordlist ids to include word in.
lists.title: Word Lists

items.description: Wordlist id to include word in.
items.title: Word List ID

matchMethod.description: Match Method to use for word.
matchMethod.title: Word Match Method

repeat.description: Match repeating characters when filtering word.
repeat.title: Word Match Repeat

separators.description: Match separator (-_ ) characters when filtering word.
separators.title: Word Match Separators

sub.description: Substitution to replace filtered word with. [Substitute]
sub.title: Word Substitute
